detectors.description:
AccountProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.0/00e2d039e94EC94172807604f85B2406271c6812_AccountProxy.sol/00e2d039e94EC94172807604f85B2406271c6812_AccountProxy.sol#6-40) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_opCodeAddress is declared in the proxy.
AccountProxy.delegate(bytes4)._opCodeAddress (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.0/00e2d039e94EC94172807604f85B2406271c6812_AccountProxy.sol/00e2d039e94EC94172807604f85B2406271c6812_AccountProxy.sol#28-29) gets value from a cross-contract call: OperationCenterInterface(opCenterAddress).getOpCodeAddress(_sig)
OperationCenterInterface appears to be a Registry contract for the proxy
The address of OperationCenterInterface is stored as a state variable: AccountProxy.opCenterAddress
Could not find setter for opCenterAddress
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.receive()
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.fallback()
